channel.title: Open Slots in upcoming Gauntlet Games 8/2020
channel.description:
@Gerrit put this up on twitter earlier, thought it would be useful here as well:
Transmission Burst Mondays: Here, at the End Monday, August 17, 9pm CET Facilitator: Steven S [https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MB03YGivl5bBEJ5ASn1…](https://t.co/a4sPuXBjQ9?amp=1)
Transmission Burst Mondays: Advent Monday, August 31, 9pm CET Facilitator: Steven S [https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MB07Q_BzlHbFQW4Cfqz…](https://t.co/jGxP8L3M2Z?amp=1)
Here Lie Death Gods [PLAYTEST] (3 sessions) Mondays, August 17th 2020, 9am CET Facilitator: Maria Mison (sword prince) [https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MDY0cFAiSZ5RUcHzhPk…](https://t.co/JiSD5zs0rK?amp=1)
Labyrinth – The Adventure Game (4 sessions) Sunday, September 13, 10:30 am CET Facilitator: David Walker [https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MB9D94_T6zVOhxoca8z…](https://t.co/w52p0L2wCE?amp=1)
Paris Gondo - The Life-Saving Magic of Inventorying Monday, August 10, 9pm Facilitator: Kalum ([@rolistespod](https://twitter.com/rolistespod)) [https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MD103rMcHUw00vcUURd…](https://t.co/rNpG8zk93a?amp=1)
